code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[identifier,setIdentifier]=useState("");const[songUri,setSongUri]=useState("");const[joined,setJoined]=useState(false);const loginWithSpotify=()=>{window.location.href="https://version1-backend.onrender.com/login";};const joinSession=async()=>{if(identifier){setJoined(true);}};const addSong=async()=>{if(!identifier||!songUri)return;try{await axios.post("https://version1-backend.onrender.com/add-song",{identifier,songUri});alert("Canción añadida a la cola");}catch(error){alert("Error al añadir la canción");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-center h-screen bg-gray-900 text-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-6",children:"Jukebox Virtual"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:loginWithSpotify,className:"bg-green-500 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg mb-4",children:"Iniciar sesi\xF3n con Spotify"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"C\xF3digo identificador",value:identifier,onChange:e=>setIdentifier(e.target.value),className:"text-black px-2 py-1 rounded mb-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:joinSession,className:"bg-blue-500 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg mb-4",children:"Unirse a una sesi\xF3n"})]}),joined&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Spotify URI",value:songUri,onChange:e=>setSongUri(e.target.value),className:"text-black px-2 py-1 rounded mb-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addSong,className:"bg-red-500 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg",children:"A\xF1adir canci\xF3n"})]})]});}export default App;
